comments:
In case of single-table strategy jpox fails with the exception below, the previous version of jpox (1.10-rc1) did not have this issue. This is therefor (probably but not certain) a jpox issue. About 8 testcases fail because of this issue. As this issue can be easily work around (choose a different inheritance strategy) this is seen as a lesser important issue.

org.jpox.store.exceptions.TableMismatchException: item_id_oid cannot be referenced in a table expression based on childitem because no join exists to its table, item_childitem
